Name: The Rusty Valve
Description: A dimly lit pub powered by hissing steam pipes. The social hub.

Name: Whistling Woods
Description: A dense, fog-heavy forest filled with feral beasts and ruins.

Name: The Hollow Pit
Description: A muddy central plaza where the townâ€™s few remaining laws are enforced.

Name: Shadow Row
Description: A labyrinth of narrow paths where the Underworld thrives. Hidden to the unobservant.

Name: Iron Pulse Forge
Description: A massive soot-covered workshop where metal is beaten into shape.

Name: The Silent Chapel
Description: A crumbling shrine dedicated to the Void. Smells of old incense and copper.

Name: The Bone-Setters
Description: A crude clinic for trauma victims and plague-watchers.

Name: The Black Market
Description: A secret cellar accessible only to those known by the criminal element.

Name: Gold Heights
Description: The clean, guarded district where the wealthy hide from the smog.

Name: The Rift
Description: A pocket dimension where reality is torn. Only for the strong-willed.

Name: Old Bio-Lab
Description: A pre-collapse facility filled with toxic sludge and ancient tech.

Name: Sewers
Description: A flooded, stinking maze beneath the city. Home to rats and worse.
